description: Try our easy to follow Pear, Bread & Butter Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pudding,Pescatarian,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Bread & butter pudding,Easter leftovers,Peanut free
name: Pear, Bread & Butter Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 slice thick white bread, crusts removed

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the bread with butter and cut each slice into 2 triangles. Layer the bread into an 8-cup ovenproof dish.
Cut the nashi pear into quarters and remove the core. Slice into thin wedges. Tuck slices in amongst the bread. Sprinkle with sultanas.
Whisk eggs with sugar and vanilla. Add milk and whisk to combine. Gently pour over bread. Sprinkle with nutmeg and then almonds. Set aside for 10 minutes.
Bake for 1 hour until custard has set and top is golden. Serve.
